data.actual_result: Shift key will change to lowercase and not capslock
data.expected_result: Shift key will change to capslock
data.short_description: Switching to capslock from shift on poor connection will change to lowercase
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on poor connection - Start typing something - From lowercase, double tap the shift key to switch to capslock and observe the key - Switch to shift and double tap the shift key to switch to capslock - Observe the shift key after that
